name: Add date of birth field in user registration page
description: Add date of birth field in user registration page
llmTaskExplanation: Add a 'date of birth' field to the user registration page. This involves updating the user registration form component to include a new input field for the date of birth, ensuring it is properly validated and stored in the database.
validations: Date of birth must be a valid date.
Date of birth cannot be in the future.
Date of birth must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
Date of birth is a required field.
unitTests: Test that the date of birth field accepts a valid date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
Test that the date of birth field rejects dates in the future.
Test that the date of birth field rejects invalid date formats.
Test that the form submission fails if the date of birth field is empty.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a user is on the registration page, when they enter a valid date of birth, then the form should accept the input.
Given a user is on the registration page, when they enter a date of birth in the future, then the form should display an error message.
Given a user is on the registration page, when they submit the form without a date of birth, then the form should display an error message.
technicalDependencies: Form validation library (e.g., Formik, React Hook Form)
security: Ensure date of birth input is sanitized to prevent injection attacks.
Validate date of birth on both client and server sides.
performance: Ensure the addition of the date of birth field does not significantly impact form load time.
businessContext: The date of birth is a critical piece of user information that may be used for age verification and personalized user experiences.
otherNotes: Consider adding a feature flag if this change needs to be rolled out gradually.

The backend is capable of handling date inputs and storing them in the database.
